GBMDIV2A.MX.short_name: GBM ADMINISTRADORA DE ACTV SA D
GBMDIV2A.MX.long_name: GBM Fondo de Inversiones Discrecionales SA de CV S.I.R.V. A
GBMDIV2A.MX.summary: The Fund's investment objective will be to take advantage of opportunities in different markets given its flexible investment regime, and may invest in shares, trackers, bonds corporate, banking or Government, denominated in pesos and other currencies, as well as structured notes of all kinds, not necessarily of protected capital, or with underlying derivatives relating to shares, rates, currencies or other assets referred to in the corresponding investment regimethat is, tools that integrate a portfolio that includes various types of securities referred to important levels of risk; You can also invest in shares of companies of equity and debt investment.

GBMPCONA.MX.long_name: GBM PORTAFOLIO CONSERVADOR S A de C V S.I.I.D A

GBMPDEUA.MX.long_name: GBM Portafolio Eespecializado en Deuda SA de CV S.I.R.V. A
GBMPDEUA.MX.summary:
"The Fund will seek to reduce the risk of investing in a single instrument through participation in the capital of other companies
investment, investing an important part in shares of investment in debt instruments and hedging
complemented with shares of equity investment called GBM Discretionary Investment Fund,
Inc. de CV, Sociedad Equity Investment (GBMDIV2) and other debt securities, both live and on repo
taking as reference the profile of a customer with a low tolerance for risk. Also will seek attractive returns by
the selection and combination of investment companies that comprise its assets. "
GBMPDEUA.MX.family: GBM Administradora de Activos SA de CV

SURCREA.MX.long_name: SURA Crecimiento SA De CV F.I.R.V. A
SURCREA.MX.summary: The underlying objective is to invest primarily in securities resources, debt securities or live documents, or through mutual funds, ETFs (Exchange Traded Funds), bank deposits of money in sight, structured notes, derivatives and repos.
